TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit InstanceCollisionException extends System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceCommandException

Docs.summary: A persistence provider throws this exception when it expects an instance to be in an uninitialized state but the instance is not in that state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A persistence provider throws this exception when it expects an instance to be in an uninitialized state but the instance is not in that state.

Docs.summary: Initializes an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An exception that is thrown as a result of a previous exception typically includes a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail.InnerException%2A> property.
